AUTHOR: Fabian Dinklage
AUTHOR_BIO_DE: Fabian Dinklage ist Studentische Hilfskraft im Ideation & Prototyping Lab der Technologiestiftung Berlin im Bereich Visualisation & Prototyping. Er studiert momentan Interface Design an der FH Potsdam. Sein Interesse liegt in der Transformation von Daten in visuelle Strukturen zur Gewinnung neuer Einsichten und der Entwicklung von bedeutsamen Mensch-Maschine Interaktionen.
AUTHOR_BIO_EN: Fabian Dinklage is a student assistant at the Ideation & Prototyping Lab of the Technologiestiftung Berlin in the field of Visualization & Prototyping. He is currently studying interface design at the FH Potsdam. His interest lies in the transformation of data into visual structures for gaining new insights and the development of meaningful human-machine interactions.
PROJECT_DESCRIPTION_DE: Wo wird in Berlin und Deutschland studiert? Ein Überblick zu Deutschlands Universitäten.
PROJECT_DESCRIPTION_EN: {Where do people the most people study in Berlin and Germany? How old is your university? The data of all universities and their metadata visualized.

SHORT_SUBTITLE_EN: Where do people the most people study in Berlin and Germany? How old is your university? The data of all universities and their metadata visualized.
